activities: Health Fitness Corporation (“HealthFitness”) gathers information from individuals about their lifestyle practices, biometrics, personal health history, health perceptions, and life/job satisfaction when they elect to complete an online health risk assessment as part of an employer-sponsored health management program. Participation is entirely voluntary. Information gathered is used to provide tailored feedback to individuals about their personal health risks and includes suggested action plans and resources for improving health-related behaviors and reducing risks. Data that HealthFitness collects from individuals in EU/EAA countries and Switzerland is processed and stored on servers in the United States.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: The personal data processed by Health Fitness Corporation within the scope of the Safe Harbor Frameworks include demographic and personal health profile data obtained from individuals who voluntarily participate in an online employer-sponsored health services program. Data covered is not manually processed.
